member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.RsMediator.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.RsMediator.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.RsMediator.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.RsMediator.IDotCoverFacade.GetSessionInfo(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.OLE.Interop.IOleUndoManager)
member.summary: Called when information about coverage session is required. Can be called before of after . Session can contain one of the following: nothing, finished item group or finished + currently executing item group.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.RsMediator.IDotCoverFacade.LocateInCoverageTree(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs LocateInCoverageTree action for given position in given file

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.RsMediator.IDotCoverFacade.CanLocateInCoverageTree(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if it is possible to perform LocateInCoverageTree action for given position if given file
